title.E_DESCRIPTION: Textual label used as identification of a statistical object.

summary.E_DESCRIPTION: Main characteristics of the data set described in an easily understandable manner, referring to the data and indicators disseminated.

otherDisseminatedData.E_DESCRIPTION: Disseminated domain, measure, and time period breakdowns of statistics in the dataset.

supplemental.E_DESCRIPTION: Supplementary descriptive text which can be attached to data or metadata.

freeExtension.COVERAGE_SECTOR.E_DESCRIPTION: Main economic or other sectors covered by the statistics.

coverageTime.E_DESCRIPTION: The length of time for which data are available.

classificationSystems.E_DESCRIPTION: Arrangement or division of objects into groups based on characteristics which the objects have in common.

freeExtension.REF_AREA.E_DESCRIPTION: The country or geographic area to which the measured statistical phenomenon relates.

freeExtension.REF_PERIOD.E_DESCRIPTION: The period of time or point in time to which the measured observation is intended to refer.

freeExtension.REF_PER_WGTS.E_DESCRIPTION: Dates or periods to which the observations used to compile the weights refer.

freeExtension.BASE_PER.E_DESCRIPTION: The period of time used as the base of an index number, or to which a constant series refers.

indexType.E_DESCRIPTION: The type of index number used in the statistical production process.

freeExtension.FREQ_DISS.E_DESCRIPTION: The time interval at which the statistics are disseminated over a given time period.

updateDate.E_DESCRIPTION: The date on which the data element was inserted or modified in the database.

freeExtension.NEWS_REL.E_DESCRIPTION: Regular or ad-hoc press releases linked to the data.

freeExtension.ONLINE_DB.E_DESCRIPTION: Information about on-line databases in which the disseminated data can be accessed.

disseminationFormat.E_DESCRIPTION: References to the most important other data dissemination done.

freeExtension.PUBLICATIONS.E_DESCRIPTION: Regular or ad-hoc publications in which the data are made available to the public.

accessibility.E_DESCRIPTION: The ease and the conditions under which statistical information can be obtained.

releasePolicy.E_DESCRIPTION: Rules for disseminating statistical data to interested parties.

freeExtension.DOC_METHOD.E_DESCRIPTION: Descriptive text and references to methodological documents available.

sourceType.E_DESCRIPTION: Characteristics and components of the raw statistical data used for compiling statistical aggregates.

freeExtension.FREQ_COLL.E_DESCRIPTION: Frequency with which the source data are collected.

collectionProcessing.E_DESCRIPTION: Systematic process of gathering data for official statistics.

compilationProcessing.E_DESCRIPTION: Operations performed on data to derive new information according to a given set of rules.

dataAdjustment.E_DESCRIPTION: The set of procedures employed to modify statistical data to enable it to conform to national or international standards or to address data quality differences when compiling specific data sets.

aggregationProcessing.E_DESCRIPTION: Processes and standards employed in calculating statistical aggregates.

freeExtension.COMPILING_ORG.E_DESCRIPTION: The organisation compiling the data being reported.

freeExtension.DATA_PROVIDER.E_DESCRIPTION: Organisation which produces data or metadata.

confidentialityDataTreatment.E_DESCRIPTION: Rules applied for treating the data set to ensure statistical confidentiality and prevent unauthorised disclosure.

confidentialityPolicy.E_DESCRIPTION: Legislative measures or other formal procedures which prevent unauthorised disclosure of data that identify a person or economic entity either directly or indirectly.

contacts.E_LABEL: Contacts for the data or metadata.
